name: cluely
description: Cross-platform AI assistant with full computer and web control

scripts.package: npm run build-backend && npm run build
scripts.permissions-check: cd backend && ../.venv/bin/python -c 'from core.macos_permissions import MacOSPermissionsManager; m = MacOSPermissionsManager(); print(m.check_all_permissions())'
scripts.status: cd backend && ../.venv/bin/python -c "import requests; print('Backend status:', requests.get('http://localhost:5000/health').json()) if True else print('Backend not running')"
scripts.install-daemon: sudo cp scripts/com.cluely.daemon.plist /Library/LaunchDaemons/ && sudo launchctl load /Library/LaunchDaemons/com.cluely.daemon.plist

author: Your Name

extendInfo.NSAppleEventsUsageDescription: Cluely needs AppleEvents access to control applications.
extendInfo.NSSystemAdministrationUsageDescription: Cluely needs admin access for system automation.
extendInfo.NSAccessibilityUsageDescription: Cluely needs accessibility access to control mouse and keyboard.
extendInfo.NSScreenRecordingUsageDescription: Cluely needs screen recording access to analyze what's on screen.
extendInfo.NSFullDiskAccessUsageDescription: Cluely needs full disk access to manage files and applications.
